missionIntro.content: Sensei: Good! You have chosen the Path of the Chef! Prepare to master the age-old tradition of cooking good sushi, samurai style!
yum
Sounds awesome! We're ready!
Hey, chef-in-training! Have you ever helped prepare a meal before?
Umm.... does buttered toast coast?
There are five belts to earn. Obtain them all to earn the honor of being called Super Sushi Chef!
Now that's a title I'd want! Let's get started!

missionOutro.content: Hey, that was fun! Making sushi is great!
Impressive! You conquered every challenge, which means you earned every belt: yellow, orange, green, purple, and black! You have also earned the title Super Sushi Chef!
My restaurant's fame has grown now that another notable sushi maker is here. Thank you friends, and congratulations!
Bye! Let's see what path we take on next!

0.content: First you must learn the basics of sushi. Don't worry, we will start simple.
To earn this YELLOW BELT we'll be doing three sushi making activities and end with word karate board.
Ready? Let us begin!

1.content: To be a good chef, one must know good taste! But to have good taste, one must eat properly.
For this ORANGE BELT we'll be doing three taste testing activities and end with word karate board.
Ready? Let us begin!

0.content: Good work! You have earned a yellow belt for learning the basics. Don't worry, there is plenty more to learn!
We can't wait! Grats on the belt, sushi buddy!
You're off to a good start. What's your favorite thing about making sushi so far?
Cool!
Time for the next challenge!

1.content: Excellent! You have earned an orange belt for learning the importance of taste. Very important in cooking!
Definitely! Grats on the belt, sushi buddy!
Say, if you could taste any food at this very moment, what would it be?
yum
Time for the next challenge!

missionIntro.content: Aah, the path of sumo! To become my offical sumo pro and make restaurant more attractive, you must grow big! Very big!
wowza
Sounds cool! I've heard they weigh hundreds of pounds, and most of it is muscle!
Hey, sumo-in-training! Have you ever seen a real sumo match before?
Don't worry, we don't have to wear those big diaper looking things.
There are five belts to earn. Obtain them all and you'll reach the highest rank in sumo -- Yokozuna!
I like how that sounds! Let's get started!

missionOutro.content: What a great time! Becoming a sumo is cooler than I thought!
Excellent! You conquered every challenge, which means you earned every belt: yellow, orange, green, purple, and black! You have also earned the title Yokozuna!
Word has spread that a skilled and powerful sumo grew strong here! Thank you for attracting the best sumo in the world to my restaurant!
Our pleasure, Sensei! It was fun! Well, let's see what path we take on next!

0.content: Your road to becoming a sumo starts with learning the sumo diet with proper eating etiquette!
To earn this YELLOW BELT we'll be doing three eating activities and end with word karate board.
Ready? Let us begin!

1.content: Although eating is good, a sumo has a strict diet! No junk food!
To earn this ORANGE BELT we'll be doing three 'yum or yuck' activities and end with word karate board.
Ready? Let us begin!

0.content: Yes! You have earned a yellow belt for learning the basics. Good work, but the road to becoming big sumo is still long!
Oh yeah! Grats on the belt, by the way!
Sumo sounds like an interesting sport. Hey future sumo, what's your favorite sport to watch or play?
Nice! I love soccer.
Time for the next challenge!

1.content: Good, good! You have earned an orange belt for avoiding junk food well!
Sweet! That's a nice belt!
Hey, future sumo! What's your favorite junk food?
I'm all about chocolate!
Time for the next challenge!

missionIntro.content: The path of guru! I'm confident you'll become the guru my restaurant needs. Prepare to explore the nutritious power of food!
bon appetit
Great! My mom says that what we eat is the key to being healthy and happy!
Hey, guru-in-training! What's your favorite healthy snack to eat?
I like veggies! Well, only with lots of ranch...
There are five belts to earn. Obtain them all to be known as the Guru Master!
Sweet! Let's get started!

missionOutro.content: How fun! I loved learning how important food is to growing strong and healthy!
Phenomenal! You conquered every challenge, which means you earned every belt: yellow, orange, green, purple, and black! You have also earned the title Guru Master!
People the world over are now arriving here to seek both nutritious food and advice on healthy eating! I thank you greatly, Mary and friends!
We couldn't have done it without ya, Sensei! Well, let's see what path we take on next!

0.content: A samurai's path to healthy diet is vitamin-rich juices! Let's start with basics.
To earn this YELLOW BELT we'll be doing three juice activities and end with word karate board.
Ready? Let us begin!

1.content: Guru also good at using energy to exercise! Time for karate!
To earn this YELLOW BELT we'll be doing three karate activities and end with word karate board.
Ready? Let us begin!

0.content: Challenge complete! You have earned a yellow belt for learning the basics. My juices are nutritious and yummy, yes?
They sure are! Grats on the belt, guru-in-training!
Does or mom or dad ever make you healthy smoothies or juices?
My dad likes raddish juice... yuck!
Time for the next challenge!

1.content: Wonderful karate! You have earned a yellow belt. Diet and exercise is key to healthy life!
Woohoo! Good job getting that belt!
Hey, have you ever watched a karate movie before?
I think they're fun to watch!
Time for the next challenge!
